entry.title: Year end reflection: landing a new job in 2025

link.title: Year end reflection: landing a new job in 2025

entry.summary: 簡而言之，時間來到 2025 年的最後一個月，我這一整年漫長的找工作之路終於暫時找到一個棲身之所。 對我來說，一份工作除了要能帶來成就感，也得是一個能讓我練功打怪、獲得報酬的地方。 前幾天我簡單統計了一下今年的求職轉換率，才驚覺數字其實不差，但我的體感卻沒有比過去幾年輕鬆多少。 Apply FirstContact HiringManager TechnicalRound Onsite(Final) Offer ~81 25 16 13 3 2 其中 Apply 包含主動投遞與 Recruiter 聯繫。我最意外的是，今年居然不到 100 個 applications。...

entry.title: Building a Scalable ETL Pipeline for AdTech Analytics

link.title: Building a Scalable ETL Pipeline for AdTech Analytics

entry.summary: In the world of digital advertising, data is everything. Transforming raw operational data into actionable insights requires robust analytics pipelines. Recently, I implemented a comprehensive ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) solution for an advertising platform that moves data from PostgreSQL to ClickHouse for high-performance analytics. Let me walk you through the process, design decisions, and...
